tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE facility (facility_id INT, facility_name VARCHAR(255), location VARCHAR(255), PRIMARY KEY (facility_id));
CREATE TABLE energy_meter (meter_id INT, facility_id INT, meter_name VARCHAR(255), meter_type VARCHAR(50), PRIMARY KEY (meter_id), FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES facility(facility_id));
CREATE TABLE energy_reading (reading_id INT, meter_id INT, reading_value FLOAT, reading_timestamp TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (reading_id), FOREIGN KEY (meter_id) REFERENCES energy_meter(meter_id));
CREATE TABLE alert (alert_id INT, meter_id INT, alert_message VARCHAR(255), alert_timestamp TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (alert_id), FOREIGN KEY (meter_id) REFERENCES energy_meter(meter_id));

CREATE TABLE dashboard_data (dashboard_id INT, facility_id INT, total_energy_usage FLOAT, data_timestamp TIMESTAMP, PRIMARY KEY (dashboard_id), FOREIGN KEY (facility_id) REFERENCES facility(facility_id));
